name: Radiant Typhoon Krosea
effectText: Cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects while your opponent controls no Spells/Traps. You can only use each of the following effects of "Radiant Typhoon Krosea" once per turn. If a Quick-Play Spell Card is activated (except during the Damage Step): You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Radiant Typhoon" card (except "Radiant Typhoon Krosea") and/or 1 "Mystical Space Typhoon" from your Deck and/or GY to your hand, also you cannot Special Summon for the rest of this turn, except WIND monsters.
